question: 揺蕩う
sourceAnswer:
<read>たゆたう</read>:: to: sway-to-and-fro/drift-about/flutter/flicker | be-fickle/be-irresolute/vacillate/waver
<read>たゆとう</read>:: to: sway-to-and-fro/drift-about/flutter/flicker | be-fickle/be-irresolute/vacillate/waver
